reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel in a business trip and and it was great.
reviews.title: Superior hotel in Sao Paulo
Very good standard and ideal for business travellers
reviews.text: The hotel is located in the Brooklyn neighborhood, a nice area with a lot of new buildings. Many international companies have their offices in that area.

reviews.title: Luxury hotel in the tech area
reviews.text: The service was very good and the room very comfortable, clean, spacious and beautiful.

reviews.title: Great Hotel for Great Price
reviews.text: The hotel looked very neat and modern. Their restaurant was excellent.
